Action: # The action you want to take on contents of the row (one sheet can include multiple actions): CREATE, EDIT, ARCHIVE
Campaign ID: # Add your campaign ID (for editing or archiving existing campaigns only; for new campaigns, leave blank) - include 'C' in front of the ID
Campaign Objective: # Set your campaign objective (for new campaigns only; if editing a campaign, leave empty or unchanged): AWARENESS, CONSIDERATION, WEB_CONVERSION, CATALOG_SALES, VIDEO
Campaign Name: # Set or edit your campaign name (required)
Campaign Status: # Set or edit your campaign status: ACTIVE, PAUSED
Ad Group ID: # Add your ad group ID (for editing or archiving existing ad groups only; for new ad groups, leave blank) - include 'AG' in front of the ID
Ad Group Name: # Set or edit your ad group name (required, max 256 characters)
Ad Group Start Date*: # Your ad group start date - set one for new campaigns or edit a future start date - enclose in brackets [YYYY-MM-DD]
Ad Group Start Time: # Your ad group start time - set one for new campaigns or edit a future start time - enclose in brackets [HH:mm] using 24 hour time format
Ad Group End Date*: # Set or edit when your ad group ends - enclose in brackets [YYYY-MM-DD].Use 'CLEAR' to remove the value on EDITs
Ad Group End Time: # Your ad group end time - set one for new campaigns or edit a future end time - enclose in brackets [HH:mm] using 24 hour time format
Ad Group Budget: # Set or edit the max amount this ad group will spend (per day, by default)
Ad Group Budget Type: # Specify if the ad group budget is LIFETIME or DAILY (for new ad groups only). If this ad group is using campaign budget, enter CBO.
Ad Group Status: # Set or edit your ad group status: ACTIVE, PAUSED
Expanded Targeting: # Dynamically targeting will automatically show your Pins on relevant queries based on your pin, without needing to add additional keywords to your campaigns. Write YES (Expanded Targeting enabled) or NO (Expanded Targeting disabled). If left blank, will default to YES.
Ad Placement: # Select or edit where your ads appear. To reach people when they are searching for something specific specify: SEARCH. To reach Pinners when they are browsing, specify: BROWSE. To target all placements, leave this field blank.
Keyword: # Set or edit keywords to reach your audience in their search results and related Pins. Place each keyword in a separate row. If you don't target interests, keywords also help surface Pins in home and category feeds. You must add at least one interest or keyword (max 20,000 keywords) per ad group)
Max Bid: # Set or edit your bid, the maximum amount you're willing to pay per desired action (Pin clicks, engagements or impressions) in your account currency. Your bid must be at least 0.10 for Engagement and Consideration campaigns and 2.00 for Awareness campaigns (charged per 1,000 impressions).
Frequency Target Time Range: # Set or edit TIME_RANGE for frequency optimization, (WEEKLY, MONTHLY)
Frequency Target: # Set or edit number of targeted impressions (frequency) per user during the timerange
Bid strategy type: # Set the ad group bid strategy: CUSTOM or AUTOMATIC (available for Consideration, Conversions, and Catalog sales objectives). If using AUTOMATIC, do not set anything in the 'Max bid' or 'Goal Value' field. If left blank, field will default to CUSTOM.
Campaign Budget: # Write YES (Campaign Budget enabled) or NO (Campaign Budget disabled). Campaign Budget is only available for Consideration. If enabled, the campaign must set either 'Lifetime Spend Limit' or 'Daily Spend Limit', and leave 'Ad group budget' empty for all child ad groups. If left blank, will default to NO.
Campaign Start Date: # Your campaign start date - required for Campaign Budget. Do not set if you are not using Campaign Budget. Enclose in brackets [YYYY-MM-DD]
Campaign Start Time: # Your campaign start time. Required for Campaign Budget. Do not set if you are not using Campaign Budget. Enclose in brackets [HH:mm] using 24 hour time format
Campaign End Date: # Your campaign end date. Required for Campaign Budget using 'Lifetime Spend Limit'. Do not set if you are not using Campaign Budget. Enclose in brackets [YYYY-MM-DD]
Campaign End Time: # Your campaign end time. Required for Campaign Budget using LIFETIME budget. Do not set if you are not using Campaign Budget. Enclose in brackets [HH:mm] using 24 hour time format
Carousel Card 1 Android Deep Link: # Add an optional Android Deep Link for card 1 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 1 iOS Deep Link: # Add an optional IOS Deep Link for card 1 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 2 Android Deep Link: # Add an optional Android Deep Link for card 2 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 2 iOS Deep Link: # Add an optional iOS Deep Link for card 2 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 3 Android Deep Link: # Add an optional Android Deep Link for card 3 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 3 iOS Deep Link: # Add an optional IOS Deep Link for card 3 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 4 Android Deep Link: # Add an optional Android Deep Link for card 4 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 4 iOS Deep Link: # Add an optional iOS Deep Link for card 4 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 5 Android Deep Link: # Add an optional Android Deep Link for card 5 of this Carousel Pin
Carousel Card 5 iOS Deep Link: # Add an optional iOS Deep Link for card 5 of this Carousel Pin
Included Audiences: # Set or edit the audiences you want to target by providing audience IDs that are comma separated and enclosed in brackets - include 'A' before the audience ID. To clear all included audiences, please use the keyword 'CLEAR' or empty brackets ('[]')
Excluded Audiences: # Set or edit the audiences you want to exclude by providing audience IDs that are comma separated and enclosed in square brackets - include 'A' before the audience ID. To clear all excluded audiences, please use the keyword 'CLEAR' or empty brackets ('[]')
Genders: # Select or edit which genders you want to target, separated by commas. Please select Female, Male, Unspecified or All, multiple genders should be comma separated and enclosed in brackets - [Female,Unspecified]
AgeBuckets: # Select or Edit the age_buckets you want to target. Write ""ALL"" or use multiple age_buckets separated by commas and enclosed in brackets - [18-24,21+,25-34,35-44,45-49,50-54,55-64,65+]
Locations: # Select or edit the locations you want to target: AU = all Australia, CA = all Canada, GB = all United Kingdom, IE = all Ireland, NZ = all New Zealand, US = all United States OR use the specific location codes found in 'Location codes' https://www.pinterest.com/_/_/help/articles/bulk-editor?qa=5, multiple locations should be comma separated and enclosed in brackets - [GB,IE]
Languages: # Set or edit the languages you want to target. Use specific language codes found in 'Language Codes' https://www.pinterest.com/_/_/help/articles/bulk-editor?qa=5  or select All, multiple languages should be separated by commas and enclosed in brackets - [en-US,en-GB].
Devices: # Set or edit the devices you want to target. Use the specific device codes found in 'Device Codes' https://www.pinterest.com/_/_/help/articles/bulk-editor?qa=5 or select All, multiple devices should be separated by commas and enclosed in brackets - [web,web_mobile]
Interests: # Set or edit interests to reach your audience in home and category feeds. Interest(s) must be enclosed in brackets, and multiple interests should be comma separated, for example: [{"id": "961238559656", "name": "art"}, {"id": "934876475639", "name": "diy and crafts"}]. You must add at least one interest OR keyword to an ad group. Please see full list of interest codes: https://www.pinterest.com/_/_/help/articles/bulk-editor?qa=5 To clear all interests, please use the keyword 'CLEAR' or empty brackets ('[]')
Geos: # Select or edit the geographies you want to target. Regions and Zip/Postal Codes should be prefixed with a country code - [US:94100] or [US-CA]. Multiple regions or zip/postal codes should be comma-separated and enclosed in brackets without quotes - [US:94100,US:94403] or [US-CA,US-VT].
Daily Spend Limit: # Set or edit your max daily spend for this campaign in your account currency (optional) - 0.00.Use 'CLEAR' to remove the value on EDITs
Lifetime Spend Limit: # Set or edit your max lifetime spend for this campaign in your account currency (optional) - 0.00.Use 'CLEAR' to remove the value on EDITs
Existing Pin ID: # Add an organic Pin ID to promote an existing Pin (only for new Promoted Pins, leave blank if you are creating a new Pin to promote) - include 'P' in front of the ID
Promoted Pin Status: # Set or edit your Promoted Pin status: ACTIVE, PAUSED
Ad Format: # Specify a format for this ad: STATIC, CAROUSEL, VIDEO, MAX_VIDEO, SHOPPING or COLLECTIONS
Promoted Pin Name: # Set or edit your Promoted Pin name (recommended, max 128 characters)
Promoted Pin URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for this Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...
Promoted Pin Third Party Tracking Urls: # Set the third party tracking urls for your Promoted Pin in the following format: {"EVENT": ["URL1", "URL2", "URL3"]} (e.g. {"click": ["https://ad.doubleclick.net/uid?adid={ad_id}"]}). Up to three tracking URLs are supported for a single event. To clear tracking urls, input empty brackets: {}
Media File Name: # Select the image or video filename (case sensitive) or a url to an image that you want to use if you are creating a new Pin to promote: JPEG or PNG or MP4 or MOV - filename.jpg. Leave this column blank if you are using an existing Pin.
Pin Title: # Add a title for your Pin if you are creating a new Pin to promote. Otherwise, leave blank
Pin Description: # Add a description for your Pin if you are creating a new Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for the new Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 1 Image File Name: # Select the image filename (case sensitive) or a url to an image that you want to use for card 1 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote: JPEG or PNG - filename.jpg. Leave this column blank if you are using an existing Pin.
Carousel Card 1 Title: # Set your card 1 title if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 128 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 1 Description: # Add a description for card 1 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 1 Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for card 1 of the new Carousel Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 1 Destination URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for card 1 of this Carousel Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...
Carousel Card 2 Image File Name: # Select the image filename (case sensitive) or a url to an image that you want to use for card 2 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote: JPEG or PNG - filename.jpg. Leave this column blank if you are using an existing Pin.
Carousel Card 2 Title: # Set your card 2 title if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 128 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 2 Description: # Add a description for card 2 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 2 Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for card 2 of the new Carousel Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 2 Destination URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for card 2 of this Carousel Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...

Carousel Card 3 Title: # Set your card 3 title if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 128 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 3 Description: # Add a description for card 3 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 3 Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for card 3 of the new Carousel Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 3 Destination URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for card 3 of this Carousel Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...
Carousel Card 4 Image File Name: # Select the image filename (case sensitive) or a url to an image that you want to use for card 4 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote: JPEG or PNG - filename.jpg. Leave this column blank if you are using an existing Pin.
Carousel Card 4 Title: # Set your card 4 title if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 128 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 4 Description: # Add a description for card 4 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 4 Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for card 4 of the new Carousel Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 4 Destination URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for card 4 of this Carousel Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...
Carousel Card 5 Image File Name: # Select the image filename (case sensitive) or a url to an image that you want to use for card 5 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote: JPEG or PNG - filename.jpg. Leave this column blank if you are using an existing Pin.
Carousel Card 5 Title: # Set your card 5 title if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 128 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 5 Description: # Add a description for card 5 if you are creating a new Carousel Pin to promote (max 500 characters) otherwise, leave blank
Carousel Card 5 Organic Pin URL: # Add a destination URL for card 5 of the new Carousel Pin you are creating, otherwise, leave blank. This is your default landing page - http://www...
Carousel Card 5 Destination URL: # Add or edit an optional destination URL override for card 5 of this Carousel Pin when it's promoted (for tracking purposes) - http://www...
Match Type: # Specify or edit your match type: BROAD, PHRASE, EXACT, NEGATIVE_EXACT, NEGATIVE_PHRASE, CAMPAIGN_NEGATIVE_EXACT, CAMPAIGN_NEGATIVE_PHRASE
